abstract: Microsoft and the European Commission canceled the only hearing planned in an inquiry into the company's Internet browser after a dispute over the attendance of regulators.
snippet: Microsoft and the European Commission canceled the only hearing planned in an inquiry into the company's Internet browser after a dispute over the attendance of regulators.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN  Microsoft and the European Commission have canceled the only hearing planned in an antitrust investigation into the company’s Internet browser because of a dispute over the attendance of European regulators serving as advisers.

headline.main: Microsoft Antitrust Hearing in Europe Canceled
headline.print_headline: Dispute Cancels Microsoft Antitrust Hearing in Europe
